other_tests.findings: Extensive diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon, with a focal area of wall thickening involving a segment of the sigmoid colon measuring approximately 5 cm. Associated sigmoid inflammatory stranding and fluid along the perisigmoid fascia. Two tiny locules of air representing local microperforation. No drainable fluid collection or gross free air is identified. A small amount of fluid tracks along the right paracolic gutter. Normal appendix.
